channel.title: courts on HE Parker Reserve Tennis Club
channel.description: Recent content in courts on HE Parker Reserve Tennis Club

item.title: Our Facilities
item.description: Courts We have six synthetic clay courts, all of which are flood lit. The most recent courts were supplied by Aste who did a fantastic job. Court and clubhouse hire is subject to availability. These are the following court hire charges for members and visitors who attend with members: Members: Day: No Charge Night: $8.00 per court, per hour Visitors who attend with a member:
